title: i hate to include minecraft but honestly
body:
if anyone here has played Cosmicpvp on minecraft and lost a 1 mil or 2 mil coinflip, this i what league of legends ranked feels like, you go in and get a 50-50 chance of winning without having a goddamn option to do anything about it, and its so. fucking. annoying. 

One person can lose the game. One person cannot win the game.
